oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hooks found voice as preacher"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greater Middle Baptist Church; Hooks, Benjamin L.; religion; 2000s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Rev. Benjamin Hooks' sermon Sunday at Greater Middle Baptist Church will be his last as pastor of the church. He will remain as minister-in-residence."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McMillin, Zach
